# UITabBarController.Mode.tabBar

**Case**

The system displays the content only as a tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case tabBar
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/elevating-your-ipad-app-with-a-tab-bar-and-sidebar].

## Setting modes

- **UITabBarController.Mode.automatic**: The system sets the display mode based on the tab’s content.
- **UITabBarController.Mode.tabSidebar**: The system displays the content as either a tab bar or a sidebar, depending on the context.
